page.title: 06St Annes - Housing contd.
page.content: In St Georges Road,St Georges Square and Clifton Drive are some of the Porritt-houses still remaining.Built of Helmshore stone and yellowbrick.The highest tribute paid to a man in the 1890's was that he was 'as sound as a Porritt-house" Property in St Annes differs dramatically,for example in Church Road the cottages,many of which have been modernised,were occupied by farmworkers and fishermen in the late 1870's. The majority of houses under review are owner occupied.There are several'bed-sits'in particular parts and a small council estate lies just outside the area.All types of housing can be found in the area and recently apartments have made an appearance. prices range from Â£138,000 and above on Inner Prom.To Â£12,000 for a flat.
